content:
As an AI language model, I don't have specific pricing information at my disposal. However, there are definitely affordable options available for mesh networking or routers with beamforming. It's worth noting that the cost of these devices can vary depending on factors like the size of your home, the number of devices you need to connect, and the overall speed and performance you're looking for. Here are a few affordable options for mesh networking:

- TP-Link Deco S4 Mesh WiFi System
- Tenda Nova MW3 Mesh WiFi System
- Google Nest WiFi Router

And here are a few routers with beamforming that are budget-friendly:

- TP-Link Archer A7 AC1750 Smart WiFi Router
- Netgear R6230 AC1200 Smart WiFi Router
- ASUS RT-ACRH13 AC1300 Dual Band WiFi Router

Keep in mind that these devices might not have all of the features of more expensive options or might not provide the same level of coverage or performance, but they can still be effective at improving your Wi-Fi signal.
